name: Krunker Mobile
description:
The low-poly FPS that had revolutionized the world of HTML5 and WebGL based games is now here on the mobile platforms, too!

Our team at the Arubis Cube department of the Asenturisk Corporation, led by D.M.I. Mukto, finally succeeded in developing the perfect mobile emulator for Krunker.io and is here to rock the stage!

_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_ 

  A fact to be noted is that we had created this app earlier in August 2019, but due to some bugs, time had to be spent on fixing them. Luckily, it is now in perfect shape! 

  -_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
